page.title: 06ULLEY RESERVOIR
page.content: { Ulley reservoir can be reached via the A618(Pleasley Road).Its entrance is situated on the main road.The reservoir was built in 1874 and the Sailing Club and club house was established in 1972.Help is available for the inexperienced and children must be at least seven years old before they are allowed to sail.Boats vary in price from Â£400-Â£750.Races are held once a week,every Wednesday from Easter to December.The types of craft using the water range from the Merlin, National 12,Mirror,Enterprise and Firefly to the most commonly seen, Laser.Some craft can be hired and while the men are sailing the ladies can join keep fit classes in the club house.Rotherham Education Authority provides sailing lessons for local schools.
